commandToExecute: perl -pi -e 's/^#PasswordAuthentication yes/PasswordAuthentication yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config && perl -pi -e 's/^PasswordAuthentication no/#PasswordAuthentication no/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config && perl -pi -e 's/^GSSAPICleanupCredentials no/GSSAPICleanupCredentials yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config && perl -pi -e 's/^#KerberosAuthentication no/KerberosAuthentication yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config && perl -pi -e 's/^#KerberosOrLocalPasswd yes/KerberosOrLocalPasswd yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config && perl -pi -e 's/^#KerberosTicketCleanup yes/KerberosTicketCleanup yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config && perl -pi -e 's/^#KerberosGetAFSToken no/KerberosGetAFSToken yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config && perl -pi -e 's/^#KerberosUseKuserok yes/KerberosUseKuserok yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config && systemctl restart sshd
